==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=厡,邍-“plain”}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|i}} – a spring {{zh-l|*泉}} bursting from a cliff-side {{zh-l|*厂}}: origin.

Current form is graphically {{Han compound|厂|白|小}}, but this is not the etymology.

===Etymology===
The sense “source, origin; basic, primary” is perhaps related to {{och-l|元|head; principal; first; great}} ({{zh-ref|Qiu, 1988}}).
